title: Crazy Cat Lady Jinx skin
body: I just wanted to see if riot would make a crazy cat Lady jinx skin. My idea is that on jinx would have like ammo belt or like grenade belt n they would be baby cats. Also her gun would have a cat rocket n every time she use it the cat goes flying out while yelling (meowwwww)

replies.body: Yea, don't it sound fun. Just image everytime she fires her rocket all u hear is meowwww meowww meowwww lol
OH!! and her bullets while using pow pow could be wet fur balls.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
too bad jinx is useless champ
Maybe because your not good with her but some of us are. I'm more of a fiddle stick kinda guy but jinx is fun to play

Cruelty to animals, also called animal abuse or animal neglect, is the human infliction of suffering or harm upon any non-human animal, for purposes other than self-defense or survival. 

what understand if its for self defence or survival its ok but every country is different. also if we are calling animal abuse on this then i call animal abuse to the game because we kill wolfs in the game isn't that the same? plus its just a game
